backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Passing of By-law - 385-391 Yonge Street

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law 800-2019 to designate 385-391 Yonge Street (Toronto Centre, Ward 13) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: Bylaw 800-2019 - To designate the property at 385-391 Yonge Street as being of cultural heritage value or interest

2019.TE3.13 - Alterations to a Heritage Property, Intention to Designate under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act, and Authority to Enter into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 363-365 Yonge Street, 367 Yonge Street, 381 Yonge Street and 385-391 Yonge Street

subheading: In the matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 385-391 Yonge Street
title: Notice of Passing of By-law - 385-391 Yonge Street
